text.tspan: rescript (train SILVA 138 reference according to primer and amplicon size)
and metadata as a BIOM file
data partition into list of 4 with
car::leveneTest() to check homogeniety of variances
car:: anova() to test differences in alpha diversity
data partition into list of 4 with
metagMisc::phyloseq_sep_variable() to further partiton according stress
tyRa::fit_sncm() to fit neutral models for each stress (4 models per plant sp)
phyloseq::subset_taxa() to retain only ASVs occuring above the 4 neutral models
phyloseq::merge_phyloseq() to regroup the 4 stresses into a single 24-sample object
Check for artefacts and biases with permutations:
base::replicate() to perform 100 permanovas that draw
ASVs at random instead of only above-neutral ASVs
metrics at every taxa level in both above-neutral
ggplot::geom_smooth() to plot these diversity indexes
data partition into list of 4 with
differentially abundant ASVs per sample group
for Random Forest predictions of stress treatment
further filter data, keeping only ASVs composing
at least 0.5% of sequences in a samples and
present in at least one quarter of the samples
and SpiecEasi::adj2igraph() to adapt output structure
define network and node metrics with several igraph package functions
100 random networks based on igraph::rewire() s
o their mean +-SD can be compared to real networks
define keystone taxa based on mean +-SD
forests based on the split of train a
performance of Random forests with either
all ASVs or only the ASVs tagged as
2) module connector, module hub, or keystone
phyloseq::ntaxa() count number of occurences of each taxa level in the relevant ASV dataset
phyloseq::ntaxa() count number of occurences of each taxa level in the ASVs not tagged as relevant
stats::fisher.test() to Perform a fisher test at each taxa level, to check if the proportion
of any given taxonomy is similar between the relevant ASV set and the ASVs not tagged as relevant
metacoder::heat_tree () to visualize relevant ASVs in each data partition,
highliting taxa levels with significantly different prpotions according the fisher test
